review: ***** ** *** * ****** ***  ******** *** ****** ** ***** ******  for a wound, the doctor asked for ultrasound *** **** *** ** ***** ******** * *** ***** **** ** 2cm* 2cm , ultrasound cost was of Rs 3000. I bet , i stayed clear of that. So, to my next surprise, doctor was making me understand how he will take sample of bacteria from the wound and create a tissue culture out of it to know the bacteria and then and only then he will give me a medication. * ****** *** ** ** ****** ********* ** * ********* **** ********* ** **** ****** ******** *** ***** ****** * ************ ** **** * ******* ****** * ** ** ****** ******** * ******* Everyone please read this feedback. It will definitely help you stay clear of the doctor as well as the hospital. ***** ****** ** ****** ****** *** ******** ********
